---
title: "About Rowan"
---

Rowan Kemmerly (she/they), M.A., is an incoming Psychology Ph.D. student at Rutgers University. She received her B.A. from Grinnell College and her M.A. in Psychology from Wake Forest University. Their current research interests include stress-related growth, the mechanisms of well-being and positive personality change, and the development of scalable well-being interventions.
